evaluation.title: Would you approve / reject / reject (resubmit) this data request?

evaluation_rationale.title: Please provide a brief rationale for your evaluation.
evaluation_rationale.description: This is mandatory if the data request is rejected.

contribution.title: How much did the applicant involved contribute to YOUth with respect to recruitment, setup, and continuation of YOUth?

informed_consent_fit.title: How does the research question fit with the provided informed consent of the participants of YOUth? (If in doubt please confer with the data manager and a privacy officer.)

research_question_answerability.title: Can the research question be answered with the requested YOUth data?

study_quality.title: Is the quality of the proposal good? Is the study design correct?

researcher_expertise.title: Does the researcher have the expertise necessary to correctly analyze and report on the research question at hand?

biological_samples_volume.title: Is the volume requested reasonable and does it not seriously deplete the resource?

biological_samples_committee_approval.title: Does the committee agree to the use of these samples for the specific research question?
